I saw a video with a woman saying basically â€œallâ€ men hate women because we were taught not to be like women. I found that even though she was saying hateful things about men, I still really liked her, suggesting men might be more complicated than she thinks.

@kairyssdal Why not ask for ideas how you could do better, not respond by saying the criticism is unjustified. This is one of my biggest criticisms of journalism, you all are not ready to learn from the experience of your users.

Like Russia an Ukraine, we were told to not think of it as a war, but it was a war.

item.description: Albany Hudson Electric Trail. https://t.co/PVwTDpt24y

Once a long time ago I went to Microsoft with a plan to bring podcasting to all their users. What came from that meeting was typical corporate CYA, had nothing to do with the idea, which would have empowered users, but instead made them consumers of sanitized programming.
Nothing came of it of course, except now 18 years later Spotify et al are doing the same bullshit and calling it podcasting. Ultimately it may make some money for them, but it wonâ€™t further the cause. Pointless.
We need to create systems of governance that really empower the people, not try to con them into a safe sanitized feeling of power. As a child of the 60s I still have the dream, but I donâ€™t think many of my generation remember.
Nothing short of total freedom to create for the people is enough or will work.

You can tell from his face that the war is killing him. I wonder how many people watching this on tv are aware that whatâ€™s happening to Ukraine is Trumpâ€™s vision of America. And if the Jan 6 attack on the Capitol had been SLIGHTLY more successful would be our reality today. https://t.co/yOJOR2vdij

Itâ€™s time for Putin to do the honorable thing and kill himself.
